section.title: Graphics

para.sentence: In the graphics shown in this section, height corresponds to the absolute value of the function and color to the phase.

section.sentence: Figure 14.22.1: P^{0}_{\ifrac{1}{2}}\left(x+iy\right) , -5\leq x\leq 5 , -5\leq y\leq 5 . There is a cut along the real axis from -\infty to -1 .
Figure 14.22.2: P^{-\ifrac{1}{2}}_{\ifrac{1}{2}}\left(x+iy\right) , -5\leq x\leq 5 , -5\leq y\leq 5 . There is a cut along the real axis from -\infty to 1 .
Figure 14.22.3: P^{-1}_{\ifrac{1}{2}}\left(x+iy\right) , -5\leq x\leq 5 , -5\leq y\leq 5 . There is a cut along the real axis from -\infty to 1 .
Figure 14.22.4: \boldsymbol{Q}^{0}_{0}\left(x+iy\right) , -5\leq x\leq 5 , -5\leq y\leq 5 . There is a cut along the real axis from -1 to 1 .
